item.title: Building Real-time ReactJS Applications with Socket.Io - Tutorial
item.description: In this article, we are going to be looking at how you can implement real-time websocket-based communication within your ReactJS web application. Why Websockets? I’ve covered this numerous times in previous articles on this site as to why we should use websockets within our applications. The benefits are numerous, and when we use socket.io, these benefits can be realized with minimal added complexity. Let’s have a look at a real-life example.
